AttachmentsStringTable.BaseOpticToolTip: 1.1x zoom scope that will put you into walking speed while zoomed
AttachmentsStringTable.PenetratingRoundsToolTip: Bullets deal full damage when penetrating through surfaces.
AttachmentsStringTable.GrenadeLauncherConcussionDescription: Fire a single Concussion Grenade from the underbarrel grenade launcher.
AttachmentsStringTable.GrenadeLauncherFlashDescription: Fire a single Flashbang Grenade from the underbarrel grenade launcher.
AttachmentsStringTable.GrenadeLauncherFragDescription: Fire a single Fragmentation Grenade from the underbarrel grenade launcher.
AttachmentsStringTable.LMGDrumMagazineDescription: Increase Magazine capacity from 50 to 100. Cannot reload.
AttachmentsStringTable.ExtendedMagazineDMRDescription: Increase Magzine capacity from 12 to 16 rounds.
AttachmentsStringTable.VectorExtendedMagazineToolTip: Increase magazine capacity from 20 to 24 rounds.
AttachmentsStringTable.ExtendedMagazineToolTip: Increases amount of ammo in magazine
AttachmentsStringTable.VectorCompensatorToolTip: Reduced recovery time between shots when using Burst Mode.
AttachmentsStringTable.CompensatorToolTIp: Reduced recovery time between shots, allowing for more accurate tap firing.
AttachmentsStringTable.BalancerDescription: Reduces vertical recoil by 20% in Hipfire
AttachmentsStringTable.TrackerRoundsDescription: While zoomed-in, damaging an enemy briefly reveals them through walls.

BombMode_Strings.KickOffAction: [Hold F] Kick ally off and Defuse

Bonsai_StringTable.BonsaiDisplayDescription: Take up arms under the shade of concrete colossi.

Breach_Strings.Ultimate_Description: EQUIP a Seismic Charge. FIRE to send a cascading quake through all terrain in a large cone. The quake dazes and knocks up anyone caught in it.
Breach_Strings.Ability1_Description: EQUIP a blinding charge. FIRE the charge to set a fast-acting burst through the wall. The charge detonates to blind all players looking at it.
Breach_Strings.GrenadeAbility_Description: EQUIP a fusion charge. FIRE the charge to set a slow-acting burst through the wall. The burst does heavy damage to anyone caught in its area.
Breach_Strings.Ability2_Description: EQUIP a seismic blast. HOLD FIRE to increase the distance. RELEASE to set off the quake, dazing all players in its zone and in a line up to the zone.
Breach_Strings.Description: The bionic Swede Breach fires powerful, targeted kinetic blasts to aggressively clear a path through enemy ground. The damage and disruption he inflicts ensures no fight is ever fair.

Characters_Global_Strings.Roles_Strategist_Description: Controllers are experts in slicing up dangerous territory to set their team up for success.
Characters_Global_Strings.Roles_Assault_Description: Duelists are self-sufficient fraggers who their team expects, through abilities and skills, to get high frags and seek out engagements first.
Characters_Global_Strings.Roles_Breaker_Description: Initiators challenge angles by setting up their team to enter contested ground and push defenders away.
Characters_Global_Strings.Roles_Sentinel_Description: Sentinels are defensive experts who can lock down areas and watch flanks, both on attacker and defender rounds.

Clay_Strings.GrenadeAbility_Description: EQUIP a Boom Bot. FIRE will deploy the bot, causing it to travel in a straight line on the ground, bouncing off walls. The Boom Bot will lock on to any enemies in its frontal cone and chase them, exploding for heavy damage if it reaches them.
Clay_Strings.Ability2_Description: EQUIP a cluster grenade. FIRE to throw the grenade, which does damage and creates sub-munitions, each doing damage to anyone in their range.
Clay_Strings.Ultimate_Description: EQUIP a rocket launcher. FIRE shoots a rocket that does massive area damage on contact with anything.
Clay_Strings.Ability1_Description: INSTANTLY throw a Blast Pack that will stick to surfaces. RE-USE the ability after deployment to detonate, damaging and moving anything hit.
Clay_Strings.Ability1_Description_Ranked:
Rank 1: +1 Charge
Rank 2: +1 Charge
Rank 3: +1 Charge
Clay_Strings.Description: Raze explodes out of Brazil with her big personality and big guns. With her blunt-force-trauma playstyle, she excels at flushing entrenched enemies and clearing tight spaces with a generous dose of "boom".
Clay_Strings.Ability1_Description_Prototype: Toss a destructible satchel that can be reactivated to boost yourself and deal moderate damage to nearby enemies. Automatically detonates after a short time.

Collection_Strings.Spray_Disabled_For_Slot_Reason: Some sprays are not allowed mid-round because they are too distracting
Collection_Strings.SkinLevel_UpgradeButton_ToolTip_Insuffic: Upgrade using Radianite Points, which can be earned through the Battlepass or purchased via the Store

Duality_StringTable.DualityDisplayDescription: Fight for control of a desert Radianite facility.

GearStringTable.LightArmor_ToolTipDescription: Absorbs 66% of total damage taken. Breaks after it has absorbed 25 damage.
GearStringTable.HeavyArmor_ToolTipDescription: Absorbs 66% of total damage taken. Breaks after it has absorbed 50 damage.

Gumshoe_Strings.Ability2_Description: EQUIP a spycam. FIRE to place the spycam at the targeted location. RE-USE this ability to take control of the camera's view. While in control of the camera, FIRE to shoot a marking dart. This dart will reveal the location of any player struck by the dart.
Gumshoe_Strings.GrenadeAbility_Description: EQUIP a trapwire. FIRE to place a destructible and covert tripwire at the targeted location, creating a line that spans between the placed location and the wall opposite. Enemy players who cross a tripwire will be tethered, revealed, and dazed after a short period if they do not destroy the device in time. This ability can be picked up to be REDEPLOYED.
Gumshoe_Strings.Ability1_Description: INSTANTLY toss the cyber cage in front of Cypher. ACTIVATE to create a zone that blocks vision and plays an audio cue when enemies pass through it
Gumshoe_Strings.Ultimate_Description: INSTANTLY use on a dead enemy player in your crosshairs to reveal the location of all living enemy players.
Gumshoe_Strings.Ability1_Description_Rank:
Rank 1: Free Charge
Rank 2: Reclaim Cooldown Reduced (10).  Destroyed Cooldown added (30).
Rank 3: Tracking Dart Upgrade
Gumshoe_Strings.GrenadeAbility_Description_Rank:
Rank 1: Free Charges per Round
Rank 2: +1 Max Charge
Gumshoe_Strings.Ability2_Description_Rank:
Rank 1: Free Charges per Round
Rank 2: +1 Max Charge
Rank 3: +1 Max Charge
Gumshoe_Strings.Description: The Moroccan information broker, Cypher is a one-man surveillance network who keeps tabs on the enemy's every move. No secret is safe. No maneuver goes unseen. Cypher is always watching.

Hunter_StringTable.Description: Born from the eternal winter of Russia's tundra, Sova tracks, finds, and eliminates enemies with ruthless efficiency and precision. His custom bow and incredible scouting abilities ensure that even if you run, you cannot hide.
Hunter_StringTable.Ability1_Description: EQUIP a bow with a shock bolt. FIRE to send the explosive bolt forward, detonating upon collision and damaging players nearby. HOLD FIRE to extend the range of the projectile. ALTERNATE FIRE to add up to two bounces to this arrow.
Hunter_StringTable.Ability2_Description: EQUIP a bow with recon bolt. FIRE to send the recon bolt forward, activating upon collision and revealing the location of nearby enemies caught in the line of sight of the bolt. Enemies can destroy this bolt. HOLD FIRE to extend the range of the projectile. ALTERNATE FIRE to add up to two bounces to this arrow.
Hunter_StringTable.Ultimate_Description: EQUIP a bow with three long-range, wall-piercing energy blasts. FIRE to release an energy blast in a line in front of Sova, dealing damage and revealing the location of enemies caught in the line. This ability can be RE-USED up to two more times while the ability timer is active.
Hunter_StringTable.GrenadeAbility_Description: EQUIP an owl drone. FIRE to deploy and take control of movement of the drone. While in control of the drone, FIRE to shoot a marking dart. This dart will reveal the location of any player struck by the dart.
Hunter_StringTable.GrenadeAbility_Description_Ranked:
Rank 1: +1 Charge
Rank 2: +1 Charge
Rank 3: +1 Charge
Hunter_StringTable.Ability1_Description_Ranked:
Rank 1: +1 Charge
Rank 2: Cooldown (40)
Rank 3: +1 Charge
Hunter_StringTable.Ability2_RankPrototypeTooltip:
Rank 1: Free charge per round
Rank 2: Cooldown (90)
Hunter_StringTable.PassiveAbility_Description: Sova's custom bow can fire his arrows and bounce them off terrain. Holding fire charges the bow's power, and the bolt is loosed when released. Press alt fire to change the number of bounces.Your arrows can bounce off terrain. Holding left click increases the bow's range trajectory. Right clicking Toggle through the desired number of terrain bounces by right clicking. The arrow is loosed when left click is released.

InGameShop_Strings.Toast_CannotRequest: Can't request a gun if you already have one.
InGameShop_Strings.Stats_AirBurstDesc: FIRE SLUG THAT SPREADS OUT AT RANGE
InGameShop_Strings.Stats_Silenced_Sound: FIRING SOUND CAN'T BE HEARD UNLESS FIRED AT
InGameShop_Strings.Stats_ROFIncrease_Desc: RATE OF FIRE INCREASES OVER TIME
InGameShop_Strings.Stats_AirBurstDesc2: SLUG DOES NO DAMAGE UNTIL SPREAD

InGameShop_Strings.BuyMessage: {playerName} ({charName}) thinks we should buy full loadouts this round.
InGameShop_Strings.SaveMessage: {playerName} ({charName}) thinks we should save Creds this round.

MessageDialog.UpdateMacOSX_Body: Please update to the latest version of macOS for best performance and stability.

Pandemic_Strings.GrenadeAbility_Description: EQUIP a chemical launcher. FIRE to launch a canister that shatters upon hitting the floor, creating a lingering chemical zone that damages and applies Fragile
Pandemic_Strings.Ultimate_Description: EQUIP a chemical sprayer. FIRE to spray a chemical cloud in all directions around Viper, creating a large cloud that reduces the vision range and maximum health of players inside of it.
Pandemic_Strings.Ability2_Description: EQUIP a gas emitter launcher that penetrates terrain. FIRE to deploy a long line of gas emitters. RE-USE the ability to create a tall wall of toxic gas at the cost of fuel. This ability can be RE-USED more than once.
Pandemic_Strings.Ability1_Description: EQUIP a gas emitter. FIRE to throw the emitter that perpetually remains throughout the round. RE-USE the ability to create a toxic gas cloud at the cost of fuel. This ability can be RE-USED more than once and can be picked up to be REDEPLOYED.
Pandemic_Strings.Description: The American Chemist, Viper deploys an array of poisonous chemical devices to control the battlefield and cripple the enemy's vision. If the toxins don't kill her prey, her mindgames surely will.
Pandemic_Strings.Passive_Description: You gradually generate and replenish the toxin that fuels your abilities. The toxin reduces the max health of anyone else while they remain inside it.

Phoenix_Strings.Ability2_Description: EQUIP a fireball. FIRE to throw a fireball that explodes after a set amount of time or upon hitting the ground, creating a lingering fire zone that damages enemies.
Phoenix_Strings.GrenadeAbility_Description: EQUIP a flame wall. FIRE to create a line of flame that moves forward, creating a wall of fire that blocks vision and damages players passing through it. HOLD FIRE to bend the wall in the direction of your crosshair.
Phoenix_Strings.Ability1_Description: EQUIP a flare orb that takes a curving path and detonates shortly after throwing. FIRE to curve the flare orb to the left, detonating and blinding any player who sees the orb. ALTERNATE FIRE to curve the flare orb to the right.
Phoenix_Strings.Description: Hailing from the U.K., Phoenix's star power shines through in his fighting style, igniting the battlefield with flash and flare. Whether he's got backup or not, he's rushing in to fight on his own terms.
Phoenix_Strings.Ultimate_Description: INSTANTLY place a marker at Phoenix's location. While this ability is active, dying or allowing the timer to expire will end this ability and bring Phoenix back to this location with full health.
Phoenix_Strings.PassiveAbility_Description: PASSIVELY heal Phoenix instead of taking damage when standing in Phoenix's own fire
Phoenix_Strings.GrenadeAbility_Tooltip:
Rank 1: Free Charge per Round
Rank 2: +1 Max Charge (2)
Rank 3: Kill Reset (2)

Poveglia_StringTable.PovegliaDisplayDescription: "Fast is fine, but accuracy is everything." - Wyatt Earp

Progression_Strings.MainMenu_Recruitment_Popup_Title: A NEW AGENT CAN BE RECRUITED
Progression_Strings.Contract_Activate_Tutorial_Body:
Activate an Agent Contract to decide which agent and cosmetic rewards you want to unlock next. If you change your mind, you can come back here to activate a different contract.

Playing matchmade games as any agent and completing missions will progress your currently active contract.
Progression_Strings.Contract_Agent_F2P_Activate: Activate this agent's contract to unlock agent specific rewards.
Progression_Strings.Contract_Agent_Activate: Activate this agent's contract to unlock the agent for play as well as agent specific rewards.
Progression_Strings.Contract_Activate_Tutorial_Flyout: Click ACTIVATE to choose your active contract
Progression_Strings.Contract_Recruit_Tutorial: Click RECRUIT to unlock this agent
Progression_Strings.Contract_Recruit_Modal_Text:
In VALORANT, you can unlock new agents and other rewards by progressing through contracts.

You are about to boost your {agent} contract to level 5, which will unlock {agent} and 4 other rewards immediately.
Progression_Strings.Contract_Tutorial: Play games to earn XP to unlock rewards and Agents
Progression_Strings.Contract_ActiveButton_Recruit_Tooltip: Play some games to receive a free agent unlock!
Progression_Strings.Contract_Agent_Active: This agent's contract is active. Play games to unlock rewards!
Progression_Strings.Contract_Agent_Complete: This agent's contract is complete. Activate another one!
Progression_Strings.MainMenu_Recruitment_Popup_Text: You are able to add a new agent to your roster. Go to the Agents Screen to select an agent!
Progression_Strings.Contract_ActiveButton_Recruit_Owned_Tool: You cannot recruit an unlocked agent, select a locked agent to recruit!

QuickBomb_TracerRounds_Strings.TracerRoundsOrbDescription: For the next 20 seconds, all allied gunshots have increased penetration and briefly reveal enemies through walls.

QuickBombGameMode_Strings.PlagueOrgDescription: After a brief delay, all enemies take 50 temporary damage for 8 seconds.
QuickBombGameMode_Strings.SpeedBoostDescription: Deploys a beacon that grants increased combat power to nearby players.
QuickBombGameMode_Strings.DeceptionOrbDescription: Enemies become paranoid: they have tunnel vision and hear decoy audio. Lasts 10 seconds.
QuickBombGameMode_Strings.HealthOrbDescription: For the next 20 seconds, all allies have out-of-combat health regeneration.
QuickBombGameMode_Strings.WeaponUpgradeDescription: Grants player a more powerful weapon.
QuickBombGameMode_Strings.DamageBoostDescription: Increases player's damage by 30% for the round.
QuickBombGameMode_Strings.GoldenGunDescription: One-shot, one-kill weapon that's fully accurate on the move. Getting a kill grants bonus ammo.
QuickBombGameMode_Strings.Name: Spike Rush

Sarge_Strings.GrenadeAbility_Description: EQUIP a stim beacon. FIRE to toss the stim beacon in front of Brimstone. Upon landing, the stim beacon will create a field that grants players RapidFire.
Sarge_Strings.Ultimate_Description: EQUIP a tactical map. FIRE to launch a lingering orbital strike laser at the selected location, dealing high damage-over-time to players caught in the selected area.
Sarge_Strings.Ability2_Description: EQUIP a tactical map. FIRE to set locations where Brimstone's smoke clouds will land. ALTERNATE FIRE to confirm, launching long-lasting smoke clouds that block vision in the selected area.
Sarge_Strings.Ability1_Description: EQUIP an incendiary grenade launcher. FIRE to launch a grenade that detonates as it comes to a rest on the floor, creating a lingering fire zone that damages players within the zone.
Sarge_Strings.Description: Joining from the USA, Brimstone's orbital arsenal ensures his squad always has the advantage. His ability to deliver utility precisesly and safely make him the unmatched boots-on-the-ground commander.

ShootinRange_Strings.OpenRangeDescription: A never ending supply of flying drones in an open air shooting range. Experiment with weapons and abilities freely with space to stretch your legs.
ShootinRange_Strings.OpenRangeDescriptionShort: Freely explore the entire range and all it has to offer.
ShootinRange_Strings.DefuseRetakeDescription: In this exercise use your tools to take out all bots defending the planted Spike. Maximize abilities and gun skills to methodically clear the site, defeat the bots and make sure you leave enough time to defuse the Spike!
ShootinRange_Strings.DefuseRetakeDescriptionShort: Methodically defeat enemies and defuse the Spike before time runs out!
ShootinRange_Strings.AdaptiveSkillTestDescription:
Shoot each target as it appears.
Targets are defeated in 1 headshot or 4 body shots.
Targets disappear after a set duration,
determined by the current difficulty level.
Difficulty increases with eliminations
and decreases after with misses.
ShootinRange_Strings.DanceHallUserInfoDescription:
Shoot each target as it appears.
Targets die in 1 headshot or 4 body shots.
Eight sets of four targets.
Difficulty will scale based on performance.
ShootinRange_Strings.TimedSkillTestDescription:
Shoot each target as it appears.
Targets die in 1 headshot or 4 body shots.
Eliminate as many targets as you can in 30 seconds.
ShootinRange_Strings.PlantDefendDescriptionShort: Take control of the site, plant the Spike, and defend it until detonation.
ShootinRange_Strings.PlantDefendDescription:
Take over the site, clear out the defending bots, and plant the Spike.

Make sure you have enough left in you to defend the Spike from an additional wave of bots who are trying to defuse it!
ShootinRange_Strings.SkillTestDescription: Test your gun skills with a variety of different shooting challenges. Go for a time challenge or mow down waves of bots using different guns and abilities.
ShootinRange_Strings.SkillTestDescriptionShort: Test your gun skills with a variety of shooting challenges.
ShootinRange_Strings.ShootingRangeEntryDescription:
The range allows you to try out different agents, guns and abilities in a controlled environment with no time constraints. Move around and discover the various exercises and challenges you can enter to practice your skills.

Check out how movement, crouching and aiming down sights impacts your accuracy and how different guns have different characteristics. Discover how guns and agents differ across a variety of scenarios.
ShootinRange_Strings.Launch_Range_PartyAdvisory: YOU WILL REMAIN IN YOUR CURRENT PARTY.
ShootinRange_Strings.ShootingRangeControlsDescription: You can swap agents at any time you see the prompt on your screen by pressing the F2 key. All agents are unlocked in the range!

Thorne_Strings.GrenadeAbility_Description: EQUIP a barrier orb. FIRE places a solid wall. ALT FIRE rotates the targeter.
Thorne_Strings.Ability2_Description: EQUIP a healing orb. FIRE with your crosshairs over a damaged ally to activate a heal-over-time on them. ALT FIRE while Sage is damaged to activate a self heal-over-time.
Thorne_Strings.Ultimate_Description: EQUIP a resurrection ability. FIRE with your crosshairs placed over a dead ally to begin resurrecting them. After a brief channel, the ally will be brought back to life with full health.
Thorne_Strings.Ability1_Description: EQUIP a slowing orb. FIRE to throw a slowing orb forward that detonates upon landing, creating a lingering field that slows players caught inside of it.
Thorne_Strings.Description: The bastion of China, Sage creates safety for herself and her team wherever she goes. Able to revive fallen friends and stave off forceful assaults, she provides a calm center to a hellish battlefield.

Triad_StringTable.TriadDisplayDescription: Three sites. Ten players. Zero time to waste.

UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_BasicMovement_Look: <Bold>Swipe</> on the <CTA>Right Side</> of your screen to look around. <Bold>Turn left!</>
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_BasicMovement_Walk: <Bold>Swipe</> the <CTA>Joystick</> or the <CTA>Left Side</> of your screen to move around. Walk to the highlighted square.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_Bomb_Defend: Defend the <Bold>Spike</> from attacking bots. They'll attack from either side!
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_Abilities_KillBots: Eliminate the targets revealed by your <Bold>Recon Bolt</>.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_Range_GoToTeleporter: Enter the teleporter to continue your training.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_Abilities_FireSonar: Equip your <Bold>Recon Bolt</> using its <CTA>Ability Button</>, then tap the <CTA>Fire Button</> to launch it at the wall marker.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_Bomb_KillBotsWithUlt: Equip your charged <Bold>Ultimate Ability</>. You can shoot the bots through the wall with it!
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_Bomb_GoToSite: Follow the walkway to the <Bold>Bomb Site</>.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_GunSkill_GoToSneakEntrance: Great work! Head inside the hall to continue your training.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_Range_ExitRange: Great work! Next, exit the skill test hall.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_Range_GoToRange: Head inside the hall to continue your training.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_Range_GoToAsylum: Once you're ready, move to the highlighted square.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_Bomb_GrabBomb: Pick up the <Bold>Spike</> by walking over it.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_BasicMovement_GrabPistol: Pick up the pistol by walking over it.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_Bomb_GoToBoathouse: Planting the <Bold>Spike</> alerts the enemy. They're on their way. Take cover in the shed behind you!
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_BasicMovement_ShootDrone: Shoot the flying drone by tapping the <CTA>Fire Button</>.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_GunSkill_ShootDrone: Shoot the flying gate drone to proceed to the next area.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_Range_AdaptiveTest: Shoot the target to start your skill test. Keep in mind: <Bold>Headshots</> kill faster than body or leg shots.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_GunSkill_KillTwoBots: Shoot the two bots with your pistol. <Bold>Standing still</> greatly increases your <Bold>accuracy</>.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_Bomb_Plant: Stand on the <Bold>Bomb Site</>, then press and hold the <CTA>Spike Button</> to plant the <Bold>Spike</>.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_GunSkill_KillTripleBots: Tap the <CTA>Alt Fire Button</> to <Bold>Aim Down Sights</>. Ahead are three bots. Position yourself so you only engage them one at a time.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_Range_BuyWeapon: Tap the <CTA>Buy Button</> to open the armory. This is where you buy different guns as well as your abilities each round.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_GunSkill_GrabRifle: The bot dropped a rifle. Pick it up by walking over it.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_Bomb_FireSonar: The bots are gathering for their final push. Charge your bow and fire a <Bold>Recon Bolt</> into one of these locations to reveal them.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_BasicMovement_Crouch: Use the <CTA>Crouch Button</> to move under the collapsed pillar.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_SneakIntro_KillBot: Use the <CTA>Joystick's</> <Bold>inner circle</> to <Bold>walk slowly</>. Your footsteps won't make noise, so you can <Bold>surprise unaware enemies</>.
UI_NPE_Mobile_Strings.NPE_Mobile_BasicMovement_Jump: Use the <CTA>Jump Button</> to jump over the debris to the highlighted area.

UI_NPE_Strings.CodeOfConduct_Intro: AS PART OF THE VALORANT COMMUNITY, I WILL:
UI_NPE_Strings.CodeOfConduct_Defense_Title: BE MY OWN LAST LINE OF DEFENSE
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_BuyCarbine: Buy a Carbine from the armory.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_DefendBomb: Defend the spike from attacking bots. They'll attack from either side!
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_KillAllBots: Destroy as many Aimbots as you can.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_KillAngleBot: Eliminate the bot holding an angle against you.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_StopToShoot: Eliminate the two bots with your pistol. Standing still greatly increases your accuracy.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_GoToTeleport: Enter the teleporter to continue your training.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_SonarBoltWall: Equip your Recon Bolt (defaulted to E key), then fire it at the wall marker.
UI_NPE_Strings.CodeOfConduct_MoreInfo: FOR MORE INFORMATION ABOUT THE VALORANT COMMUNITY CODE VISIT PLAYVALORANT.COM
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_GoToBombSite: Follow the walkway to the enemy's site.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_MoveOn: Great work! Head inside the hall to continue your training.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_Aimbots: Headshots kill faster than body or leg shots. Shoot the target to start your skill test.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_GoToSkillsTest: Headshots kill faster than body or leg shots. Shoot the target to start your skill test.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MIssionObjective_ShiftSneak: Hold the SHIFT key to slow to a walk so your footsteps don't make noise. This allows you to surprise unaware enemies.
UI_NPE_Strings.CodeOfConduct_Respect_Text: I understand that respect and empathy build trust, and that trust is needed so everyone can perform their best.
UI_NPE_Strings.CodeOfConduct_Protect_Text: I will build the community I want to play in, one match at a time. I will champion the needs of others, while striving to keep my games welcoming and fair for everyone.
UI_NPE_Strings.CodeOfConduct_Defense_Text: I will help Riot keep me safe. I will be responsible with my account, devices, personal information, and conduct.
UI_NPE_Strings.InvalidSkillsTest: Invalid SkillTestClass set on {Name}.  Skill test will not function properly.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_PickUpBomb: Pick up the Spike by walking over it.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_GetPistol: Pick up the pistol by walking over it.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_Pistol: Pick up the pistol by walking over it.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_GoToBoatHouse: Planting the spike alerts the enemy. They're on their way. Take cover in the shed behind you.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MIssionObjective_UseUltimateX: Press X to equip your charged ultimate ability. You can shoot the bots through the wall with it!
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_BuyWeapon: Press the B key to open the armory. This is where you buy different guns as well as your abilities each round.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_FreeShooting: Press the ESC key to open the settings menu. There you can change your mouse sensitivity and customize your keybinds. Once you're ready, move to the highlighted square.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_TryRifle: RIGHT CLICK to aim down sights. Ahead are three bots. Position yourself so you only engage them one at a time.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_DestroyDrone: Shoot the flying gate drone by LEFT or RIGHT CLICKING your mouse.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_AssaultDrone: Shoot the flying gate drone to proceed to the next area.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_PlantBombHotkey: Stand on the plant site, then press and hold 4 to plant the spike.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_StopModule: Stop module and return to start?
UI_NPE_Strings.CodeOfConduct_TeamPlayer_Text: Teamwork wins games. I recognize that I can only win WITH teammates, not in spite of them.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_GetRifle: The bot dropped a rifle. Pick it up by walking over it.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MIssionObjective_SonarSetup: The bots are gathering for their final push, charge your bow and fire a Recon Bolt into one of these locations to reveal them.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_Jump: Use SPACE BAR to jump over the debris to the highlighted area.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_Crouch: Use the LEFT CTRL key to crouch under the collapsed pillar.
UI_NPE_Strings.NPE_MissionObjective_WASD: Use the WASD keys to move around. Walk to the highlighted square.

UI_PhotoSensitivity_Strings.PhotoSensitivity_DescriptionBody: A very small percentage of individuals may experience epileptic seizures when exposed to certain light patterns or flashing lights. Exposure to certain patterns or backgrounds on a computer screen, or while playing video games, may induce an epileptic seizure in these individuals. Certain conditions may induce previously undetected epileptic symptoms even in persons who have no history of prior seizures or epilepsy. If you, or anyone in your family, have an epileptic condition, consult your physician prior to playing. If you experience any of the following symptoms while playing a video or computer game -- dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitches, loss of awareness, disorientation, any involuntary movement, or convulsions - IMMEDIATELY discontinue use and consult your physician before resuming play.
UI_PhotoSensitivity_Strings.PhotoSensitivity_Tip2: Avoid playing when you are sick, tired, and/or under the influence of medicine or drugs
UI_PhotoSensitivity_Strings.PhotoSensitivity_Tip1: Consult your doctor before playing if you have serious medical conditions, if you are pregnant or elderly, or if you have an implanted medical device
UI_PhotoSensitivity_Strings.PhotoSensitivity_Tip4: Do not use earphones at a high volume as hearing loss may occur
UI_PhotoSensitivity_Strings.PhotoSensitivity_Tip3: Keep your eyes as far away as possible from the screen
UI_PhotoSensitivity_Strings.PhotoSensitivity_Tip5: Play in a comfortable posture to avoid numbness, stiffness or other discomfort
UI_PhotoSensitivity_Strings.PhotoSensitivity_Tip7: Stop playing if you are experiencing any discomfort
UI_PhotoSensitivity_Strings.PhotoSensitivity_TipsHeader: TIPS FOR USE OF VIDEO GAMES TO REDUCE EPILEPTIC SEIZURES AND OTHER HEALTH CONCERNS
UI_PhotoSensitivity_Strings.PhotoSensitivity_Tip6: Take regular breaks during play sessions. The length and frequency of necessary breaks may vary from one person to another

UI_Scoreboard_Strings.MissingInAction_Tooltip: This player has abandoned the game and won't be spawned in until they return. Their team will receive compensation.

UI_Settings_Strings.Tooltip_ImproveClarity: A full-screen postprocess that increases contrast in midtones, giving you a more clear picture. This is a relatively expensive feature, but you will only notice a FPS hit if you are GPU bound. If you have a high-end GPU, we recommend keeping this on.
UI_Settings_Strings.RemoteInterpDelay_Tooltip: Additional buffering for other players' incoming network data.  Higher values can produce smoother movement for remote players by adding a small amount of latency.
UI_Settings_Strings.Toggle_HRTF_Audio: Applies Head Related Transfer Function to 3D sounds. For most users this makes pinpointing sound easier. For some it may make audio sound "echoey".
UI_Settings_Strings.Tooltip_HRTF_Audio: Applies Head Related Transfer Function to 3D sounds. For most users this makes pinpointing sound easier. For some it may make audio sound "echoey".
UI_Settings_Strings.ColorBlind_Tooltip: Changes the color of the highlight on enemy characters
UI_Settings_Strings.NewPlayerSettings_Desc: Confirm your preferences for communication with your party and teammates.
UI_Settings_Strings.Tooltip_AllyAbilityAudioEnabled: Controls whether you can hear nearby allies equipping abilities
UI_Settings_Strings.MouseWheelWrapsInventory: Cycle to Next/Prev Weapon Wraps Inventory
UI_Settings_Strings.Vignette_Description: Darkens corners of your screen to help you focus on the center of your screen. This has a small but noticeable GPU performance impact.
UI_Settings_Strings.Show_FramesPerSecond_Description: Display Frames Per Second on screen
UI_Settings_Strings.Distortion_Description: Distortion is used to create effects that appear to distort things behind them. Orbs, explosions, and some agent abilities use this. Turning this on will render that effect, at the cost of minor performance. There is no cost when no distortion is on-screen.
UI_Settings_Strings.Tooltip_MouseLatencyOrFramerateOption: Do you prefer lower input latency or higher framerate?
UI_Settings_Strings.PartyVoiceForCustom_Tooltip:
Enable party voice during a custom game.
You'll be able speak to both spectators and the enemy team
during agent selection and during game.
UI_Settings_Strings.Shadows_Description: Enables dynamic shadows on the first-person weapons and arms. Turning this feature off will improve performance on some older graphics cards.
UI_Settings_Strings.MultithreadedRendering_Description:
Enables multithreaded rendering for better performance on powerful machines.
Provides largest benefit with a fast GPU and extra CPU cores.
UI_Settings_Strings.Toggle_FadeCrosshairWithFiringError_Desc: Fade out the top crosshair line during extended fire
UI_Settings_Strings.SaveFailedError_Message: Failed to save settings to the server.
UI_Settings_Strings.ClientFrameRate_Description: Frames per second for the client.
UI_Settings_Strings.ServerFrameRate_Description: Frames per second for the server.
UI_Settings_Strings.ShowMatureContentTooltip: Globally enables or disables mature content. Changing this value may require a restart to take effect.
UI_Settings_Strings.NetworkBufferingDescription:
Helps with poor networking conditions including packet loss and ping spikes. 
This option will buffer additional incoming data to smooth out 3P player movement and reduce outgoing data to reduce load on your bandwidth.
This allows for smoother movement and reduced network load, at the cost of potential sub-second delays on movement and input.
UI_Settings_Strings.Tooltip_LanguageSelectionRestart: Language selection will be applied next time you restart the game.
UI_Settings_Strings.LimitFPSInBackgroundDescription: Limit framerate when game is in the background.
UI_Settings_Strings.MaxFPSInBackgroundDescription: Maximum framerate when the game is in the background.
UI_Settings_Strings.Crosshair_Alignment_Tooltip_Message:
Mixing even and odd numbered thicknesses - such as a 1px dot and 2px inner lines - will create visual misalignment.

Since displays have an even number of pixels (e.g. 1920x1080), and crosshairs are rendered pixel-perfect, odd thickness elements must be anchored slightly off visual center. Alignment of odd numbered thicknesses has no negative effect on accuracy. 

To avoid misalignment, be sure to use all even (2, 4, 6) or all odd (1, 3, 5) thickness elements.
UI_Settings_Strings.MuteMusicOnAppWindowDeactivate_label: Mute Music When Game Window Out Of Focus
UI_Settings_Strings.Description_PartyVoice: Only players you choose to party with will be able to talk with you in this channel. It is present during and outside of the match, and has no restrictions on how players choose to communicate.
UI_Settings_Strings.PartyPushToTalk: Party Voice Push To Talk Key
UI_Settings_Strings.CPUBoundPercentage_Description: Percentage of recent frames bound by the CPU.
UI_Settings_Strings.GPUBoundPercentage_Description: Percentage of recent frames bound by the GPU.
UI_Settings_Strings.AudioSpeakerConfig_Tooltip: Sets speaker configuration for audio output.
UI_Settings_Strings.Toggle_ShowCrosshairInSpectatorMode_Desc: Show Spectated Player's Crosshair instead of your own
UI_Settings_Strings.TeamPushToTalk: Team Voice Push To Talk Key
UI_Settings_Strings.TeamVoiceChat_Description: Team voice chat can only be activated using a push-to-talk (PTT) key.
UI_Settings_Strings.Tooltip_VoiceOverAmount: The amount of VO played in-game
UI_Settings_Strings.AspectRatio_Description: The game view is constrained to be 16:9 - if your monitor is a different aspect, then you may choose between Letterboxing or Filling the screen (cutting off edges)
UI_Settings_Strings.VoiceOverLanguageTooltip: The voice-over language to use in game.
UI_Settings_Strings.Description_TeamVoice:
This channel is available to all members of your team and is provided to improve coordination. To reduce noise and ensure all comms are sent intentionally, players can only use push-to-talk modes here. We expect all participants to be respectful and practice empathy.  Players who are disruptive here will be removed from the VALORANT community.

To curate your voice experience, we encourage muting frustrating individuals, and reporting those who intentionally abuse or disrupt this privilege from the in-game settings menus. If you do not wish to participate in voice chat, it can also be disabled here or at any point in the settings menus.
UI_Settings_Strings.IdleFrameTime_Description: Time spent idle each frame due to a frame limiter.
UI_Settings_Strings.RHIFrameTime_Description:
Time spent in the Render Hardware Interface thread each frame.
The RHI thread is responsible for issuing commands to graphics hardware when multithreaded rendering is enabled.
UI_Settings_Strings.CPUFrameTime_Description:
Time spent in the game thread each frame.
The game thread is responsible for updating most parts of the game simulation (ex. processing inputs, moving, shooting).
UI_Settings_Strings.GPUFrameTime_Description:
Time spent in the render thread each frame.
The render thread is responsible for deciding what objects in the scene need to be rendered and issuing commands to graphics hardware (when multithreaded rendering is disabled).
UI_Settings_Strings.BloomOption_Description: Uses bloom to feather bright light across the screen to simulate perception of bright light. Turning this on will have bright objects appear more realistically (primarily weapons) at the cost of framerate. A constant cost.
UI_Settings_Strings.VerticalSync_Description: VSync synchronizes the game framerate with your monitor's refresh rate. Turning this on will reduce tearing, but decrease framerate.
UI_Settings_Strings.VoipDucksMusicVolume_Tooltip: When active, this feature lowers the music volume when team or party voice chat are audible.
UI_Settings_Strings.VoipDucksFlavorVO_Tooltip: When active, this feature lowers the volume for non-gameplay character voiceover lines while team or party voice chat are audible.
UI_Settings_Strings.MuteMusicOnAppWindowDeactivate_tooltip: When active, this feature mutes music when the game window is not in focus.
UI_Settings_Strings.Tooltip_LoopbackTest: While loopback test is on, you will be able to see the power your mic puts out on the Mic Sensitivity Threshold. Loopback will automatically be disabled when settings is closed.
UI_Settings_Strings.DialogText_KeepDisplaySettings:
Would you like to keep these display settings?

Reverting to previous settings in {0} seconds.
UI_Settings_Strings.VoiceMutedTooltip: You have been restricted from transmitting in team voice.
UI_Settings_Strings.VoiceMutedDatedTooltip: You will be able to use team voice again on {date}.

UI_Store_Strings.SouthKoreaTermsAndConditions: I've read through legal statement for purchasing online goods and I agree with it.

UI_Store_Strings.NoOffers: There Are No Store Offers Available
UI_Store_Strings.RiotPayError: There was an error opening the VALORANT Points purchase page. If this persists, please contact Player Support.

Vampire_Strings.GrenadeAbility_Description: EQUIP an ethereal, destructible eye. ACTIVATE to cast the eye a short distance forward. The eye will Nearsight all enemies who look at it.
Vampire_Strings.Description: Forged in the heart of Mexico, Reyna dominates single combat, popping off with each kill she scores. Her capability is only limited by her raw skill, making her sharply dependant on performance.
Vampire_Strings.Ability2_Description: INSTANTLY consume a nearby Soul Orb, becoming intangible for a short duration. If EMPRESS is active, also become invisible.
Vampire_Strings.Ultimate_Description: INSTANTLY enter a frenzy, increasing firing, equip and reload speed dramatically. Gain infinite charges of Soul Harvest abilities. Scoring a kill renews the duration.
Vampire_Strings.Ability1_Description:
Soul Harvest: Enemies killed by Reyna leave behind Soul Orbs that last 3 seconds.
Devour: INSTANTLY consume a nearby soul orb, rapidly healing for a short duration. Health gained through this skill exceeding 100 will decay over time. If EMPRESS is active, this skill will automatically cast and not consume the Soul Orb.

Voting_Strings.VoteNotif_SurrenderStarted: A surrender vote has begun. Use /{slashCommand0}, /{slashCommand1}, {voteKeybind0}, or {voteKeybind1} to vote.
Voting_Strings.Surrender_Command_Description: Call a vote to surrender the game
Voting_Strings.Surrender_VoteFailed: Surrender vote failed. The game will continue.
Voting_Strings.Vote_CommandNotAvailable: This command is not currently available.
Voting_Strings.Vote_CommandAlreadyVoted: You have already participated in this vote.
Voting_Strings.Surrender_InvalidTooEarly: You may only attempt a surrender vote from round 8 onwards.
Voting_Strings.Surrender_AllyTeamSurrendered: Your team has voted to surrender.
Voting_Strings.Surrender_InvalidAlreadyAttempted: Your team may only attempt to surrender once per half.
Voting_Strings.VoteNotif_Queued: Your vote has been queued. It will activate at the next available round start.

Wraith_Strings.Description: A phantom of a memory, Omen hunts in the shadows. He renders enemies blind, teleports across the field, then lets paranoia take hold as his foe scrambles to uncover where he might strike next.
Wraith_Strings.Prototype_Description_Teleport: An enigmatic shadow, Wraith covers the battlefield and darkness and can teleport to unexpected locations. When Wraith's waround, it's never certain if you're ever truly safe.
Wraith_Strings.Ability1_Description: EQUIP a blinding orb.  FIRE to throw it forward, briefly reducing the vision range and deafening all players it touches. This projectile can pass straight through walls.
Wraith_Strings.Ability2_Description: EQUIP a shadow orb, entering a phased world to place and target the orbs. PRESS the ability key to throw the shadow orb to the marked location, creating a long-lasting shadow sphere that blocks vision. HOLD FIRE while targeting to move the marker further away. HOLD SECONDARY FIRE while targeting to move the marker closer. PRESS RELOAD to toggle normal targeting view.
Wraith_Strings.GrenadeAbility_Description: EQUIP a shrouded step ability and see its range indicator. FIRE to begin a brief channel, then teleport to the marked location.
Wraith_Strings.Ultimate_Description: EQUIP a tactical map. FIRE to begin teleporting to the selected location. While teleporting, Omen will appear as a Shade that can be destroyed by an enemy to cancel his teleport, or PRESS EQUIP for Omen to cancel his teleport.
Wraith_Strings.GrenadeAbility_Description_Rank:
Rank 1: +1 Charge
Rank 2: +1 Charge
Rank 3: Cooldown (20)
Wraith_Strings.Ability2_Description_Rank:
Rank 1: +1 Charge
Rank 2: Cooldown (60)
Rank 3: Cooldown (20)
Wraith_Strings.Ability1_Tooltip:
Rank 1: Free Charge per Round
Rank 2:

Wushu_Strings.Ability_X_Description: EQUIP a set of highly accurate throwing knives that recharge on killing an opponent. FIRE to throw a single knife at your target. ALTERNATE FIRE to throw all remaining daggers at your target.
Wushu_Strings.Ability_Xalt_Description: EQUIP a set of highly accurate throwing knives that recharge on killing an opponent. FIRE to throw a single knife at your target. ALTERNATE FIRE to throw all remaining daggers at your target.
Wushu_Strings.Ability_P_Description: Holding the jump button while falling allows you to glide through the air.
Wushu_Strings.Ability_Q_Description: INSTANTLY propel Jett high into the air.
Wushu_Strings.Ability_E_Description: INSTANTLY propel Jett in the direction she is moving. If Jett is standing still, she will propel forward.
Wushu_Strings.Ability_4_Description: INSTANTLY throw a projectile that expands into a brief vision-blocking cloud on impact with a surface. HOLD the ability key to curve the smoke in the direction of your crosshair.
Wushu_Strings.Description: Representing her home country of South Korea, Jett's agile and evasive fighting style lets her take risks no one else can. She runs circles around every skirmish, cutting enemies up before they even know what hit them.
